mapper.select: select tc.id,tc.emoji_id,tc.content,tc.create_time,tc.create_user,tu.profile_photo,tu.username from emoticons.tb_comment tc left outer join tb_user tu on tc.create_user = tu.id where tc.emoji_id=#{emojiId} and reply_id is null and reply_reply_id is null order by tc.create_time

select tc.id,tc.emoji_id,tc.reply_reply_id,tc.content,tc.create_time,tc.create_user,tu.profile_photo,tu.username from tb_comment tc left outer join tb_user tu on tc.create_user=tu.id where tc.reply_id=#{commentId}
